name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast Word and Character Count on Selection

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a word and character count when text is highlighted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly get word and character counts with a single text highlight! 

With the Instant Text Counter extension, simply highlight any text on a webpage, and a small, unobtrusive box will display the word and character count. 

- Works seamlessly on any webpage.
- No complicated settings—just install and use!
- Lightweight and fast, with minimal permissions required.
- Perfect for writers, students, and anyone needing quick text statistics.

Whether you’re editing content or simply curious about the length of a selection, Instant Text Counter makes it easy. Install now and enjoy the convenience of on-the-fly text analysis!
